name: philips-hue-experiments
description: Some experiments around Node Hue Api for Philips HUE

scripts-info.register-user: Register an user in your Philips Bridge and prints it so you can use it to run other commands.
scripts-info.start-colors-loop: Start a colors loop with all lamps
scripts-info.stop-effects: Stop all effects in all lamps
scripts-info.set-color: Set color for all lamps, accepts a first argument as the accepts a first argument as the color wished. Accepts CSS names, HEX, RGB, RGBA and HSL.
scripts-info.set-brightness: Set brightness for all lamps, accepts a first argument as a brightness percentage (min: 0, max: 100)
scripts-info.set-saturation: Set saturation for all lamps, accepts a first argument as a saturation percentage (min: 0, max: 100)
scripts-info.set-color-temperature: Set color temperature  for all lamps, accepts a first argument as a color temperature value (min: 153, max: 500)
